about_the_game:
Welcome to BUSH SIMULATOR

The game you didn’t ask for, but you’re getting anyway!

What’s the point?
Who knows?! All you do is gaze at a bush from every possible angle. That’s it. Seriously.

EPIC FEATURES:

EXTREME BUSH VIEWING:

Get ready to see a bush like never before—because you’ve never really looked at a bush until you’ve played Bush Simulator.

NOTHING HAPPENS:

No quests, no enemies, no plot. Just you, a camera, and one magnificent bush.

LEAFY OVERLOAD:

This bush has leaves. So many leaves. It’s practically drowning in them.

Why play?

Because sometimes, you just need to do absolutely nothing—and what better way to do that than with a bush? So, grab your popcorn, sit back, and enjoy the ride (or rather, the lack thereof). Bush Simulator: The ultimate non-adventure awaits!

name: Bush Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Bush Simulator, the game you never knew you wanted and probably still don't, but hey, it's here! Get ready to experience the ultimate in bush observation—because who needs explosions, zombies, or epic quests when you can just... look at a bush?
